EmailTemplate.name: CBFS-Rubbermaid Wavebrake
EmailTemplate.subject: New Solutions by Rubbermaid
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
When life gets messy, Office Depot has the tools needed to help clean it up!
Rubbermaid is an exclusive partner of Office Depot and provides everything from personal floor care to commercial grade floor options.
The WaveBrake Mop Bucket and Wringer features specially designed WaveBrake baffles to help reduce splashing for a safer environment, cleaner floors, and improve productivity. The WaveBrake side press wringers are more efficient than comparable side press wringers and more durably constructed lasting up to 45 times longer than injection molded wringers.
Features:
WaveBrake Baffle Technology reduces splashing up to 40%
High efficiency side press wringers
Tested to perfrom up to 40,000 wring cycles roughly 50 times more than average cycles
Non-marking casters leave floors looking their best
Premium tubular steel and structural web molded plastic
